gameDescription: In this quiz you have to guess the bird by its song. Each question has six possible answers. Correct answer on the first attempt increases the score by 5 points, each next attempt gives one point less, if the correct answer is given on the last, sixth attempt, score does not increase. In the Gallery section, you can view information about all the birds, as well as listen to audio.
resultIsSaved: Result is saved. You can see it on result page.
plaeseWaitUntilResultIsSaved: Please wait untill result is saved.
name: name
resultPart1: You passed the quiz and scored out
